channel.title: Mistake about Mullvad Browser
channel.description:
Mullvad Browser is falsely described as having uBlock Origin disabled, please fix in "Other: uBlock Origin:" kicksecure dot com/wiki/Dev/Default_Browser#Mullvad_Browser
Source: mullvad dot net/en/browser/mullvad-browser (search for "uBlock Origin") and also it's enabled on my device

item.title: Mistake about Mullvad Browser
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
That link does not exits.

Seems that has changed since that wiki chapter was written. Updated in wiki just now.

Related:

  • Posting Links for New Users
  • Improve the Documentation / Edit the Kicksecure Wiki

Read full topic
